nodes.text: The Beginning of the End is a mini-adventure published in the Supernova supplement for the Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. It was written by Bill Olmesdahl.

With the hours counting down until the Demophon supernova, the people of Demophon are getting desperate. The characters are sent to the doomed world to find Enid Vahr, a missing rebel agent with vital information for the Alliance that must survive the system's destruction. It is a race against time to find the agent and get off planet before the Demophon system faces its fiery destruction.
